Key Match Events: Chahal takes his second wicket of the match as he dismisses Dhananjaya de Silva, equaling Bhuvneshwar Kumar's feat of most T20I wickets for India with a total of 90 scalps.
Suryakumar Yadav smashes 51 (26) in style with a boundary, hitting his 14th international half-century.
Suryakumar registers his third T20I century and first for India in 2023, scoring 100 off just 45 balls.
Pre-Game Insights: Hardik Pandya: We'll bat first. Looks like a good track, the last time we played here, the ball did a bit, we might get more swing in the night.
Dasun Shanaka: We would have batted first as well. We wanted to set the tone upfront. We will approach the same way in this game, one change for us, Avishka Fernando replaces Bhanuka Rajapaksa.
Post-Match Reflections: And India finally clinch the series
Along with Suryakumar Yadav's brilliant batting and lethal bowling of Indian youngsters, Team India registers victory by 91 runs at Rajkot in the 3rd T20I against Sri Lanka. India win series 2-1.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Madushanka dismisses Ishan Kishan 1(2) in the first over of the game.
Rahul Tripathi and Shubman Gill hammered Madushanka in the third over. 15 runs come from the over.
India win toss! Team India wins toss and opts to bat first.
